xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:ABriefOnTypesOfCustomersExplan: BF Utilities Limited serves B2B customer namely Bharat Forge Ltd. for meeting their energy requirements for the plants located in state of Maharashtra.

xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:SpecificCommitmentsGoalsAndTar: Our organisation acknowledges the significance of establishing targets to assess advancement towards achieving all the principles of the National Guidelines on Responsible Business Conduct (NGRBC). Considering that we are in our initial year of ESG adoption, we intend to specify our objectives and targets in the upcoming reporting period. We recognise the need to align our ESG efforts with our business goals, and we are committed to implementing a comprehensive and effective ESG strategy that ensures sustainability and creates long-term value for all our stakeholders. We are dedicated to enhancing our ESG practices and performance and look forward to sharing our progress in the future

xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:StatementByDirectorResponsible:
Dear Stakeholders,
I am pleased to present the BRSR report for BF Utilities Limited (BFUTILITIE), a Company engaged in the generation of electricity through wind mills. Corporate governance is of utmost importance to us and we are dedicated to achieving transparency and governance goals. We adhere to established policies and frameworks that guide ethical decision-making in all our engagements. Considering that we are in our initial year of ESG adoption, we intend to specify our objectives and targets in the upcoming reporting period. We recognise the need to align our ESG efforts with our business goals, and we are committed to implementing a comprehensive and effective ESG strategy that ensures sustainability and creates long-term value for all our stakeholders. We are dedicated to enhancing our ESG practices and performance and look forward to sharing our progress in the future.
Thank you for your continued support and partnership. Sincerely,
Mr. Amit Kalyani Director DIN : 00089430 BF Utilities Limited
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfTheHighestAuthorityRe: Mr. Amit Kalyani, Director is responsible for the implementation and oversight of Business Responsibility Policy.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfSpecifiedCommitteeOfT: The Company has a well-established internal governance structure to ensure implementation of various policies. We review the implementation of policies through our internal audit, Risk management process, monitoring of KPI's in-line with established policies

xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:TopicsOrPrinciplesCoveredUnder: Awareness programme for all Independent directors informing them about their roles, rights and responsibilities
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:NameOfTheRegulatoryOrEnforceme: National Stock Exchange of India Limited
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:BriefOfTheMonetaryCaseForPenal: The listed entity had not filed the Standalone & Consolidated financial results for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2024 within the prescribed period as per Regulation 33 of SEBI LODR
The listed entity had not filed the Standalone & Consolidated financial results for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2024 within the prescribed period as per Regulation 33 of SEBI LODR
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfAnyCorrectiveActionTa: Company is making all the efforts to not repeat the violation resulting in fines.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:ThePremisesOrOfficesOfTheEntit: Not Applicable as the Company does not have any differently abled employees. Further, the company will make necessary arrangements as specified under Rights of Persons with Disabilities Act, 2016 as and when the Company hires any such differently abled employees
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfOccupationalHealthAnd: The Company acknowledges that there are no occupational health and safety hazzards associated with its business opeations. However, the well-being of its employees remain a top priority. We ensure the availability of first aid kit at our location. We conduct annual health check ups of our employees.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DesclosureOfTheProcessesUsedTo: In light of our business operations, hazard identification is not applicable.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DescribeTheMeasuresTakenByTheE: The Company ensures the availability of first aid kit at our location. We conduct annual health checkups of our employees.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DescribeTheProcessesForIdentif: We place great emphasis on stakeholder identification. Our stakeholder identification process remains a continuous undertaking, enabling us to remain informed, engaged, and responsive to the ever-evolving needs of our stakeholders.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:PurposeAndScopeOfEngagementInc: To share updates of the Company during AGM
To share updates of the Company during AGM
To share updates of the Company
To share updates of the Company and work related updates
To update on various compliances and to seek approvals
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DescribeTheInternalMechanismsI: The employees can directly share their feedback, ideas and grievances with HR. HR will revert with relevant solutions.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:MechanismsToPreventAdverseCons: The Company has internal complaint committee under Section 4 (1) of Sexual harassment of Women at Workplace (Prevention, Prohibition and Redressal) Act, 2013.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DescribeTheMechanismsToReceive: Step 1: Beneficiaries grievances are usually addressed by our implementing partner at their level. Step 2: If unresolved they may contact CSR committee or visit our location.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DescribeTheMechanismsInPlaceTo: The Company has only one consumer belonging to same group of companies. As a result, Company and the Consumer are in direct communication and there is no need to establish a separate mechanism to receive and respond to consumer complaints and feedback.
xbrli:xbrl.in-capmkt:DetailsOfAnyCorrectiveActionsT: The Company has taken corrective action after making payment of penalty and settlement amount. We ensure to reply to the regulators for any information as required by regulators.
